attributes.action: Should the English vote on whether they wish to stay in a union with Scotland
attributes.background: The Scottish have had a say on it. Why can't the English ?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. 

You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for all UK citizens to have a vote in a referendum on Scottish independence: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/169636

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
